001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import static io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.ClientUtils.blockingWait;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.time.Duration;
009import java.util.AbstractMap;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.Optional;
013import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
014import java.util.stream.Collectors;
015
016import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest;
017import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpRequest;
018import io.sphere.sdk.json.SphereJsonUtils;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
020
021import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
023
024public class CompatRequest<TResult> extends ApiMethod<CompatRequest<TResult>, TResult>
025        implements ClientRequestCommand<TResult> {
026
027    private final SphereRequest<?> request;
028    private final Class<TResult> resultClass;
029    private final String projectKey;
030
031    private CompatRequest(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey, SphereRequest<?> request,
032            final Class<TResult> resultClass) {
033        super(apiHttpClient);
034        this.request = request;
035        this.projectKey = projectKey;
036        this.resultClass = resultClass;
037    }
038
039    private CompatRequest(CompatRequest<TResult> t) {
040        super(t);
041        this.request = t.request;
042        this.resultClass = t.resultClass;
043        this.projectKey = t.projectKey;
044    }
045
046    public static <TResult> CompatRequest<TResult> of(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey,
047            final SphereRequest<?> request, final Class<TResult> resultClass) {
048        return new CompatRequest<>(client, projectKey, request, resultClass);
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    protected CompatRequest<TResult> copy() {
053        return new CompatRequest<>(this);
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public ApiHttpRequest createHttpRequest() {
058
059        HttpRequest httpRequest = request.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest("/" + projectKey);
060        List<Map.Entry<String, String>> headers = httpRequest.getHeaders()
061                .getHeadersAsMap()
062                .entrySet()
063                .stream()
064                .flatMap(
065                    e -> e.getValue().stream().map(v -> new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<String, String>(e.getKey(), v) {
066                    }))
067                .collect(Collectors.toList());
068
069        final URI resolve = URI.create(httpRequest.getUrl());
070        return new ApiHttpRequest(ApiHttpMethod.valueOf(httpRequest.getHttpMethod().name()), resolve,
071            new ApiHttpHeaders(headers),
072            Optional.ofNullable(httpRequest.getBody())
073                    .map(body -> SphereJsonUtils.toJsonString(body).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
074                    .orElse(null));
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    public ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, Duration timeout) {
079        return blockingWait(execute(client), timeout);
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TResult>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client) {
084        return client.execute(this.createHttpRequest(), resultClass);
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public boolean equals(Object o) {
089        if (this == o)
090            return true;
091
092        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass())
093            return false;
094
095        CompatRequest<?> request1 = (CompatRequest<?>) o;
096
097        return new EqualsBuilder().append(request, request1.request)
098                .append(resultClass, request1.resultClass)
099                .append(projectKey, request1.projectKey)
100                .isEquals();
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public int hashCode() {
105        return new HashCodeBuilder(17, 37).append(request).append(resultClass).append(projectKey).toHashCode();
106    }
107}
